name: Inkra Aristrarchus
history:
Technical Administrators, Production Overseers, Fleet Commanders and Ace Pilots. Every descendant of Olympus - every member of the illustrious Aristarchus familia - will attain a lofty title. If you don't? Then it is a simple matter to revoke your origin.

Inkra Aristarchus. The pride of the Aristarchus family, along with perhaps one or two of her siblings. Blood, however, is a violent tether in this family. Families must be strong... and what better way to cultivate strength than to prune the weak? Pit your cultured offspring against one another? The successes will rise, and the failures will fall. That's how it has always been. Natural selection. Inkra couldn't forget this lesson - this insinuation from her mother - if she tried. Being presented as a prodigy puts a bounty on your head. Snuff the young prodigy's spark, halt the inferno that it'll become. Sometimes she still feels the fingers around her neck.

That's a cruel ultimatum. One could attribute Inkra's dedication to this unforgiving bloodline as tenacity or determination, but the truth is much more mundane. If you're good at something, why stop? Inkra aced tests meant for older kids and passed exams some adults couldn't even fathom. The steps of her early life were paved before her, and it's so easy to walk forward when people are pushing you. Surgeries. Medicines. Therapies. Tortures, if you asked her back then, but so many told her these were gifts and boons, shaping her into the ideal successor. Features lodged in her skull, pressed into her brain, her eyes, her heart. Perfect the perfect body, sharpen the honed mind. Turn problems into solutions with the minimal effort. Turn those who oppose you into nothingnesss all the same.

Naturally, she was in for a rude awakening; the Olympus Academy teaches someone how to excel, sure, but what of personality? Morality? When facing down a barrel held in the hands of someone who should love you, what then? There's no button to press, no command to execute, no machine to activate to solve these sorts of problems. The solution is apparent but the intangible repercussions forewarn her - hesitation is unfamiliar and untrained, worry pains her chest and clouds her mind. The systems she feels at home with are simple and logical, like her parents, like the academy, like her quarters - like how things should be.

And her Practical Olympus Exclusive Mandated Field Experience has only just begun.

systems.flavorDescription: This system upgrade appears to add auxiliary INSTINCT systems that are capable of autonomous operation independent of the base INSTINCT rig, increasing the efficacy of systemic invasion attempts. Pilots report unnerving low-frequency humming when this tech is installed without the parent rig.

H0r_OS II builds further on the framework established by H0R_OS I, enabling the now-autonomous program to manifest an “Other” – a wholly new being constructed from aggregate user and environmental data. Others may be adapted to resemble a person, an object, or even a physical phenomenon. While the simulacrum isn’t perfect, it’s good enough to confuse systems and most observers on a first look.
The use of turret drones is a rather traditional form of force multiplication – one that has remained the backbone of defense in many theaters.
The GMS Type-3 Projected Shield traps and denies incoming projectiles by projecting an aggressive, superpositional anti-ballistic barrier.

weapon.flavorDescription: The autopod is a small antipersonnel weapon apparently devised by HORUS communocyphers to continue offensive action in the event of its operator’s death. Each unit is, in theory, governed by a spur of INSTINCT’s protomind. No new models have been encountered since DHIYED, and all extant versions of the Autopod are to be considered extremely dangerous as the INSTINCT code powering their onboard protominds is likely to have corrupted further since their creation.

systems.flavorDescription: By installing additional armor plating, redundant firing circuits, and enhanced insulation to magazines the longevity of a frame’s armaments can be greatly enhanced.
The use of turret drones is a rather traditional form of force multiplication – one that has remained the backbone of defense in many theaters.

weapon.flavorDescription:
Much like GMS mechs, GMS weapons are reliable galactic standards, made using interchangeable parts and built to withstand almost any conditions. There are three lines currently in production.
The Type-III (T-3) line is made up of heavy weapons, ordnance, and other exotic, specialized, or massive weapons. A broad classification, the T-3 range includes conventional-kinetic anti-materiel rifles, super-rapid cycling pulse rifles, missile racks, cannons, and drone nexuses – “hive”style launchers that serve as miniature factory, hangar, and deployment systems for portable drones. The classification also includes the fearsome “segment knife”, a system that uses flash-printing to produce disposable edged weapons in a vicinity around the user.

The classification also includes the fearsome “segment knife”, a system that uses flash-printing to produce disposable edged weapons in a vicinity around the user.

Much like GMS mechs, GMS weapons are reliable galactic standards, made using interchangeable parts and built to withstand almost any conditions. There are three lines currently in production.
The Type-I (T-1) line is defined by powerful, reliable, and conventional-kinetic ranged and melee weapons, including the GMS assault rifle, heavy machine gun, shotgun, pistol, and various light and heavy blades. Reliable galactic standards, the GMS T-1 line is the most widely used mech-scale line of weaponry across the galaxy. Echoing the Everest’s design notes, T-1 weapons are simply designed, with few (if any) moving parts, intended to be used in or adaptable to any environment.

bondPowers.name: Eyes of the Void
bondPowers.description: You can see perfectly well in even pitch darkness, fog, or poor weather conditions. Gain +1 Accuracy and increased effect on checks that rely on surveying or observing your surroundings. You can see even fine detail up to a mile away unaided.

bondAnswers: Esoteric technology, implanted in your cortex
Fleeing from fingers that sprout fingers that sprout fingers all aiming to bury into my skin.
minorIdeal: I witnessed something terrifying, mind-bending, or glorious.

armor.flavorDescription: As a quick action, pilots wearing stealth hardsuits can become Invisible. They cease to be Invisible if they take any damage.

weapons.flavorDescription: Light A/C weapons might be knives, bayonets, punching daggers, and short swords.
Light signature weapons might be oversized revolvers, braces of pistols, and submachine guns.

gear.flavorDescription: A strong base-layer suit that recycles water, generates nutrients, and adapts very rapidly to hostile environs, maintaining a stable condition and extending survivability. Flexsuit wearers can go for roughly a week without eating or drink thanks to the ambrosia paste generated by their suit before its systems are depleted; however, they don’t prevent feelings of hunger. Removing the suit for a day or two is enough to replenish its reserves. Flexsuits also maintain a steady temperature within acceptable parameters.

This clear, plastic-like sheet can be placed over the wounds of severely injured pilots. It instantly begins to stabilize them, injecting medicine and deploying nanites to stitch wounds shut.
Expend a charge to apply correctives to Down and Out pilots, immediately bringing them back to consciousness at 1 HP.

A subjectivity-enhancement suite is a set of cybernetic implants allowing users to hack systems without a rig. Users of these suites blend the organic with the synthetic, gaining the ability to extrude implanted universal-plug cables from within their body to make hardline connections with terminals. When plugged in, users can access a comprehensive, fully interactive alternate-reality interface with direct omninet access, making navigating – or hacking – local and networked systems as easy as wishing it so (of course, you must be careful: by opening up your mind to the digital, you may face dangers other, less enhanced people are ignorant of).
